Mod.Name: Add Royalty prestige BOR armor
Mod.Description: Adds Solar, Quasar and Tenebral tiers of Royalty armors (Prestige Recon, Prestige Marine, Cataphract and Prestige cataphract) and allows them to be used with Royal Titles. Kwazaar Bazaar will get a heavy marine variant.

Mod.Name: Add BOR variants of Royalty implants
Mod.Description: Adds three tiers of Royalty-like implants to the game: psychic sensitizer, psychic harmonizer, psychic reader, neurocalculator, learning assistant, gastro-analyzer, immunenhancer, coagulator, healing enhancer, toughskin glands, armorskin glands, stoneskin glands, aesthetic shaper, aesthetic nose, reprocessor stomach, circadian assistant, circadian half-cycler, mindscrew, drill arm, field hand, hand talon, elbow blade, knee spike, venom fangs, and venom talon. Combat Extended compatible.

Mod.Name: Add BOR variants of Royal Arsenal armors
Mod.Description: Adds Solar, Quasar and Tenebral tiers of Royal Arsenal armors to the game: ranseur, personal cloaking system, guardian armor, phalanx armor, as well as their prestige variants. Combat Extended compatible.

Mod.Name: Add BOR variants of Rimsenal Federation apparel
Mod.Description: Adds Solar, Quasar and Tenebral tiers of Rimsenal: Federation apparel to the game: jumpsuit, Judicator, Marksman and unity guard. Combat Extended compatible.

Mod.Name: Add BOR variants of Rimsenal - Augmented Vanilla Pack apparel
Mod.Description: Adds Solar, Quasar and Tenebral tiers of Rimsenal - Augmented Vanilla Pack apparel to the game: exosuit, protective gear and tac gear. Combat Extended compatible.

Mod.Name: Allow Rimsenal benches to use BOR linkable facilities
Mod.Description: Allows the Rimsenal benches to use BOR linkables to speed up their work. This is specific because Rimsenal uses a different classname from all the other mods. You probably want this on.

Mod.Name: Add BOR variants of Rimsenal satchels
Mod.Description: Adds 3 variants of the Rimsenal's portable bomb satchels. CE Compatible.

Mod.Name: Add BOR variants of Rimsenal - Core apparel
Mod.Description: Adds Solar, Quasar and Tenebral tiers of Rimsenal - Core apparel to the game. Combat Extended compatible.

Mod.Name: Integrate Rimputers into BOR tech tree
Mod.Description: Rimputers' Quantum Computer will be required for all BOR researches.

Mod.Name: Improve Rimputers' progress curve
Mod.Description: Rimputers research steps will require previous computer type to be connected to allow for research.

Mod.Name: Retexture Rimputers' Quantum Computer
Mod.Description: Rimputers' Quantum Computer will be retextured to fit BOR theme.

Mod.Name: Integrate Rimmunizations into BOR Lore
Mod.Description: Makes the Rimmunization research tree the prerequisite for BOR Drugs.

Mod.Name: Move Replimat buildings to Beyond tab
Mod.Description: Adds Replimat buildings to Beyond architect tab and puts them in a dropdown.

Mod.Name: Make the isolinear components craftable with BOR Benches
Mod.Description: Adds a costly recipe to both tier 2 and tier 3 benches that will allow you to create the isolinear components for Replimat.

Mod.Name: Rebalance Replimat buildings in line with Beyond Our Reach
Mod.Description: Increases costs and power consumption of the Replimat buildings. Fixes ReplimatHopper's texture placement.

Mod.Name: Move Replimat research to Quasar tech
Mod.Description: Moves Replimat research to BOR Tier 2 research and increases its cost.

Mod.Name: Make Replimat components be carried by Kwazaari traders
Mod.Description: Adds a trade tag to isolinear module so that it's carried by Kwazaari merchants in bulk.

Mod.Name: Integrate RepairHubs into BOR Research
Mod.Description: Moves RepairHubs into BOR Research as Solar-tier technology.

Mod.Name: Integrate RepairHubs into cost structure of BOR
Mod.Description: Makes Repair Hubs use BOR materials to be built.
